question: As per the Union Ministry of Women and Child Development, how many children were missing in the year 2020?
explanation:
The Union Ministry of Women and Child Development created “Track Child portal”, to track the missing and found children.
The Ministry provided the statistics recorded on this portal for the last 5 year. In the year 2020, from January 2020 to January 2021, 43515 children were found missing and 38113 children were found. All concerned authorities are asked to update the portal regularly.
